name: Controlled useState
description: Pagination demo with 42 static items, selectable page size, and navigation controls using controlled components with useState hook
approach: Uses React's useState hook to manage current page and page size states. Implements pagination logic with useMemo for efficient item slicing. Provides proper boundary checking and console logging.
features: Console logging in required format: 'Strona: N' and 'Rozmiar: K'
Bootstrap card layout with responsive design
Page preview with active page indication
